title: Bookstores
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Bookstores**

**Canada**  
_ **ON** _  
_Toronto_

- [**Swipe Books on Advertising and Design**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.swipe.com/)  
477 Richmond Street West, Toronto, Ontario M5V 3E7  
Opening Times: Mon—Fri _10am—7pm_; Sat _12pm—6pm_

_ **QC** _  
_Montréal_

- [**Librairie du Centre Canadien d’Architecture/Canadian Centre for Architecture Bookstore**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.cca.qc.ca/bookstore/)  
1920 rue Baile, Montréal, Québec H3H 2S6  
Opening Times: Wed—Sun _10am—5pm_; Thu _10am—9pm_

**Finland**  
_Helsinki_

- **Keski-Töölön Paperikauppa Oy**  
Ruusulankatu 18, 00250 Helsinki  
Opening Times:

**France**  
_Paris_

- [**Virgin Megastore**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.virginmegastores.fr/)  
52/60 Avenue des Champs-Elysées, 75008 Paris  
Opening Times: Mon—Sat _10am—12 midnight_; Sun _12 noon—12 midnight_

**Germany**  
_Berlin_

- [**Bücherbogen am Savignyplatz**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.buecherbogen-berlin.de/)  
Stadtbahnbogen 593, 10623 Berlin  
Opening Times: Mon—Fri _10am—8pm_; Sat _10am—6pm_
- [**Pro qm**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.pro-qm.de/)  
Almstadtstraße 48-50, 10119 Berlin  
Opening Times: Mon—Sat _12am—8pm_

_Mainz_

- [**The Gutenberg Museum**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.gutenberg-shop.de/)  
Liebfrauenplatz 5, 55116 Mainz  
Opening Times: Tue—Sat _9am—5pm_; Sun _11am—3pm_

**Ireland**  
_Dublin_

- [**Cathach Rare Books**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.rarebooks.ie/)  
10 Duke Street, Dublin 2  
Opening Times: Mon—Sat _9:30am—5:45pm_
- [**Waterstones**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.waterstones.ie/)  
7 Dawson Street, Dublin 2  
Opening Times: Mon—Wed _9am—7pm_; Thu _9am—8pm_; Fri & Sat _9am—7pm_; Sun _11am—6pm_

**Italy**  
_Bologna_

- [**Fabrica Features**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.fabrica.it/)  
 40125 Bologna, Via Rizzoli 8  
Opening Times:

_Milano_

- [**Hoepli**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.hoepli.it/)  
I-20121 Milano, Via Hoepli 5  
Opening Times: Mon-Sat 10am-7:30pm
- [**raas Milano**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.raasgallery.it/)  
I-20141 Milano, Via Pietrasanta 14  
Opening Times:

**The Netherlands**  
_Amsterdam_

- [**Nijhof & Lee**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.nijhoflee.nl/)  
Staalstraat 13a, 1011 JK Amsterdam  
Opening Times:

**Spain**  
_Barcelona_

- [**CCCB (Centre de Cultura Contemporània de Barcelona)**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.cccb.org/eng/info/llib.htm)  
c/ Montalegre 5, 08001 Barcelona  
Opening Times: Tue—Sat _10:30am—8:30pm_
- [**La Central del MACBA (Museu d’Art Contemporani de Barcelona)**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.lacentral.com/)  
Plaça del Àngels 1, 08001 Barcelona  
Opening Times: Mon—Fri (Except Tuesday) _10am—8pm_; Sat _10am—8:30pm_; Sun _10am—3pm_
- [**Loring Art**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.loring-art.com/)  
c/ Gravina 8, 08001 Barcelona  
Opening Times: Mon—Fri _10am—8:30pm_
- [**ras Barcelona**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.rasbcn.com/)  
c/ Doctor Dou 10, 08001 Barcelona  
Opening Times:

**Sweden**  
_Sodertalje_

- [**Antikvariat Morris**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.svaf.se/morris/index_eng.htm)  
Vingavagen 3, SE-152 70 Sodertalje  
Opening Times: _By appointment only_

**Switzerland**  
_Zürich_

- [**Orell Füssli (Krauthammer)**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.books.ch/)  
Marktgasse 12, Zürich  
Opening Times:

**UK**  
_ **England** _  
_London_

- **Collinge & Clark**  
13 Leigh Street, London WC1H 9EW  
Opening Times:
- [**Magma**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.magmabooks.com/)  
117—119 Clerkenwell Road, London EC1R 5BY  
Opening Times: Mon—Sat _10am—7pm_

8 Earlham Street, Covent Garden, London WC2H 9RY  
Opening Times: Mon—Sat _10am—7pm_; Sun _12 noon—6pm_

- [**Tate Modern Shop**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.tate.org.uk/modern)  
Bankside, London SE1 9TG  
Opening Times: Sun—Thu _10am—6pm_; Fri & Sat _10am—10pm_

_Manchester_

- [**Magma**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.magmabooks.com/)  
22 Oldham Street, Northern Quarter, Manchester M1 1JN  
Opening Times: Mon—Sat _10am—6:30pm_; Sun _11am—5pm_

**USA**  
_ **CA** _  
_Santa Monica_

- [**Hennessey + Ingalls**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.hennesseyingalls.com/)  
214 Wilshire Blvd, Santa Monica, CA 90401  
Opening Times: Mon—Sun _10am—8pm_

_ **DE** _  
_New Castle_

- [**Oak Knoll Books**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.oakknoll.com/)  
310 Delaware Street, New Castle, DE 19720  
Opening Times: Mon—Fri _9am—5pm_

_ **IL** _  
_Chicago_

- [**Powell’s Bookstores**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.powellschicago.com/)  
2850 North Lincoln Avenue, Chicago, IL 60657  
Opening Times: Sun—Fri _11am—9pm_; Sat _10am—10pm_

828 South Wabash Avenue, Chicago, IL 60605  
Opening Times: Mon—Fri _10:30am—6pm_; Sat _10am—6pm_; Sun _12 noon—5pm_

1501 East 57th Street, Chicago, IL 60637  
Opening Times: Mon—Sun _9am—11pm_

- [**Prairie Avenue Bookshop**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.pabook.com/)  
418 South Wabash Avenue, Chicago, IL 60605  
Opening Times: Mon—Fri _10am—6pm_; Sat _10am—4pm_

_ **MN** _  
_Minneapolis_

- [**James & Mary Laurie Booksellers**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.lauriebooks.com/)  
921 Nicollet Mall, Minneapolis, MN 55402  
Opening Times: Mon—Sat _10am—6pm (or by appointment)_
- [**Minnesota Center for Book Arts**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.mnbookarts.org/theshop/theshop.html)  
1011 Washington Ave S, Suite 100, Minneapolis, MN 55415  
Opening Times: Tue _10am—9pm_; Wed—Sat _10am—5pm_

_ **NY** _  
_New York City_

- [**Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.cooperhewitt.org/)  
2 East 91st Street, New York, NY 10128  
Opening Times: Mon—Thu _10am—5pm_; Fri _10am—9pm_; Sat _10am—6pm_; Sun _12 noon—6pm_
- [**Dexter Sinister**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.dextersinister.org/)  
38 Ludlow Street (Basement), New York, NY 10002  
Opening Times: Sat _12 noon—6pm_
- [**McNally Robinson**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.mcnallyrobinsonnyc.com/)  
52 Prince Street (between Lafayette and Mulberry), New York, NY 10012  
Opening Times: Mon—Sat _10am—10pm_; Sun _10am—9pm_
- [**Mercer Street Books & Records**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.mercerstreetbooksandrecords.com/)  
206 Mercer Street, New York, NY 10012  
Opening Times: Mon—Sun _10am—10pm_
- [**New Museum**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.newmuseum.org/)  
235 Bowery, New York, NY 10002  
Opening Times: Tue—Sat _12 noon—6pm_; Thu _12 noon—8pm_
- [**Printed Matter**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.printedmatter.org/)  
195 Tenth Avenue, New York, NY 10011  
Opening Times: Tue & Wed _11am—6pm_; Thu—Sat _11am—7pm_
- [**Shakespeare & Co.**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.shakeandco.com/)  
716 Broadway (Washington Place), New York, NY 10003  
Opening Times: Sun—Thu _10am—11pm_; Fri & Sat _10am—12 midnight_

137 East 23rd Street (Lexington), New York, NY 10021  
Opening Times: Mon—Sun _10am—8pm_

- [**Skyline Books**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.skylinebooks.com/)  
13 West 18th Street, New York, NY 10011  
Opening Times: Mon—Sat _11am—6pm_; Sun _11am—3pm_
- [**St. Mark’s Bookshop**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.stmarksbookshop.com/)  
31 Third Avenue, New York, NY 10003  
Opening Times: Mon—Sat _10am—12 midnight_; Sun _11am—12 midnight_
- [**Strand Bookstore**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.strandbooks.com/)  
828 Broadway (12th Street), New York, NY 10003  
Opening Times: Mon—Sat _9:30am—10:30pm_; Sun _11am—10:30pm_; _Rare books room closes daily at 6:30pm_
- [**Urban Center Books**](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015190315/http:/www.urbancenterbooks.org/)  
457 Madison Avenue, New York, NY 10022  
Opening Times: Mon—Fri _10am—6:30pm_; Sat _12 noon—5:30pm_
author: Conor
